text: Ndipo gulu la anthu a paulendo lidabwera ndipo lidatumiza mmodzi wa anthu otunga madzi, ndipo adaponya ndowa yake, Iye adafuula nati, “Imvani nkhani yabwino! Uyu mnyamata.” Ndipo iwo adamutenga iye namubisa iye ngati katundu wawo wa malonda. Koma Mulungu anali kudziwa zonse zimene iwo anali kuchita
